trans-unit.source: An inline-level flow content element which causes content to render with an underlined text decoration.
trans-unit.target: 内联级别流内容元素，使内容以便呈现带下划线的文本效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的空实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>类，将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>对象作为新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> </xref>对象，它指定新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>类，将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>对象作为新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>，和一个<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref>指定新的插入位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> </xref>对象，它指定新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, in which case no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，在这种情况下没有<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref> element after it is created, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no automatic insertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref>指定要插入的插入位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>元素，它在创建后或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>以表示不自动插入。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref> class, taking two <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> objects that indicate the beginning and end of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>类，使用两个<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref>指示的开头和末尾的内容所包含的新选择的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is intended to initialize a new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline> element such that it encloses a selection of pre-existing content.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于初始化新<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>其包围的预先存在的选择内容的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> indicating the beginning of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，该值指示要包含新的内容的选择内容的开头<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> indicating the end of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，该值指示要包含新的内容的选择内容结束<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when start and end do not resolve to a range of content suitable for enclosure by a element, for example, if start and end indicate positions in different paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: 时引发 start 和 end 不能解析为广泛的一内容适用于通过机箱元素，例如，如果 start 和 end 指示不同段落中的位置。
